resources.string: Hello! You\'ve chosen to play \'%s\'!\n Have Fun!!
What do you want to listen to today? :D
Users can search for local songs by entering keywords to the search box.\nTapping on result item will open Music Player and play that song
This screen displays local music\'s playlist list.
This screen displays all songs containing inside selected playlist.
This screen displays local music\'s artist list.
This screen displays all songs of selected artist.
This screen displays all songs that user marked as Favorite.
